isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - HEADLINER TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Headliner Trim Panel on Daycab

step1.para:
Remove header console panel, refer to
HEADER CONSOLE PANEL
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove two push-in fasteners (Item 2) at the top of passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 3). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove two push-in fasteners (Item 4) at the top of driver side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.
Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove two push-in fasteners (Item 6) at the back of headliner trim panel (Item 7). Lay them out of the way and save for installation.

Remove coat hook (Item 8) at the back of headliner trim panel (Item 7) by pulling coat hook cover (Item 9) down. With the coat hook cover down out of the way, push coat hook lever (Item 10) down and remove coat hook. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove push-in fastener (Item 11) from above passenger side door opening in headliner trim panel (Item 7). Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 87. Headliner Trim Panel on Daycab Models

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. PASSENGER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL
5. DRIVER SIDE CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

step1.para: Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove push-in fastener (Item 12) from above driver side door opening in headliner trim panel (Item 7). Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

Using push-in fastener removal tool (Item 1), remove push-in fastener (Item 13) from above windshield in the center of the headliner trim panel (Item 7), support the front of the headliner trim panel after removing push-in fastener. Lay it out of the way and save for installation.

Once all the push-in fasteners (Items 2, 4, 6, 11, 12 and 13) and coat hook (Item 8) have been removed, Lower front of headliner trim panel (Item 7) at the windshield. Slide headliner trim panel forward and carefully pull it out from behind passenger and driver side corner and side interior trim panels (Items 3 and 5) and remove from cab. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
